name: 5. TOFU CURRY
preparation: Aromatics. Get the grated garlic and ginger and cut 2-3 chillies and put all together in a SCODELLA.
Cut the cauliflower in small pieces.
Spices. 1 sp of turmeric, paprika, ½ sp of coriander and cinnamon and nutmeg. Also you can add curry leaves and black mustard seeds

Curry. Add oil to a pin. Then add black mustard seeds and cumin seeds (1 spoon each) and toast them for 1 minute. Now add the aromatics (garlic and ginger) and a little bit of water.. After 1-2 minutes add the spices, curry leaves and salt and pepper. Add a bin of coconut milk and tomato sauce. Also add a spoon of coconut sugar and bring to a nice simmer. After 3-4 minutes add the cauliflower and mix it softly. Leave it there for 2-3 minutes.
Tofu. Rinse the tofu and cut it into boxes. Boil the tofu in water for 2-3 minutes.
Chop the spinach and add it to the curry. Also you can add some garam masala and lemon. Add the tofu at the top of it.
